# Virtual environment
venv/
env/
*.pyc
*.pyo
__pycache__/

# Configuration sensitive
.env
*.env

# Database
*.sqlite3
db.sqlite3

# Static and media files
/static/
/media/

# Django migrations
**/migrations/*
!**/migrations/__init__.py

# Logs
*.log
*.out
*.err

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*.bak
*~
*.tmp
